pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.6.0, Misc! $(li)Adds the Volcanic Accumulator, a mana and lava producer!$(li)Adds Lava Lily, a decorative block.$(li)Mana Transfers will now attempt to fill jars completely.$(li)Fixes various lighting bugs.$(li)Fixes missing block hitboxes.$(li)Fixes the spell book casting on a Scribes Table.

$(li)Adds JEI and Data Pack support for the Enchanting Apparatus and Glyph Press recipes.$(li)New renderer and animation for Glyph Press$(li)Fixes the Shield effect.$(li)Arcane Ore can now be silk touched, fortuned, and drops EXP.$(li)Radial Menu now works correctly with an offhand spell book.$(li)The glyph press can now be automated used Hoppers.
